Package io.netty.channel.rxtx

A serial and parallel port communication transport based on RXTX.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RxtxChannelConfig
    A configuration class for RXTX device connections.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RxtxChannel
    A channel to a serial device using the RXTX library.
    RxtxChannelOption<T>
    Option for configuring a serial port connection
    RxtxDeviceAddress
    A SocketAddress subclass to wrap the serial port address of a RXTX device (e.g.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RxtxChannelConfig.Databits  
    RxtxChannelConfig.Paritybit  
    RxtxChannelConfig.Stopbits
